about_the_game:
Embark on an epic science fiction adventure with our top-down isometric game. Using the keyboard to navigate and the mouse to aim and shoot, you'll explore a galaxy where our civilization has transcended the boundaries of its solar system. Through a series of linear scenarios, each narrating a vital part of our spatial history, you will face enemies that will challenge your skill and agility.

In this universe, central governments have given way to private space research agencies, and you, as a brave 'Sciense Soldier', will be hired to unravel the mysteries of unknown planets. With the keyboard, you will direct your character through challenging environments, while with the mouse, you will shoot at enemies and overcome obstacles that stand in your way to discovery.

The game features:

Top-Down Isometric Gameplay
Dual Control
Linear Narrative Scenarios
Varied Challenges
Space Science Fiction Environment

Prepare for an experience that combines action, skill, and an immersive narrative.

name: Science Soldier

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2310
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTS 450 or equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Generation and above
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 600 Series or equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "Science Soldier" is an indie action and shooting game with an isometric view, focused on a linear space adventure. Face tactical challenges and alien enemies through varied scenarios, advancing through an intriguing science fiction storyline.
